name: Mãe do Ouro
description:
The legend of Mãe do ouro, in Brazilian folklore, is a ball of fire that indicates the places where there are deposits of gold that should not be explored.

Sometimes, at dawn, this fireball would also transform into a beautiful woman with a long silk dress and golden hair reflecting light and flying through the air.

In some parts of Brazil, she takes the form of a beautiful woman who inhabits caves, and, after attracting men who mistreat their wives, she makes them leave their families, but tries not to leave the woman suffering.<Crypto Legends | A Series by Renancio Monte | 2021>
